chunks.text:
```markdown

# How to Handrub1. Apply 1 to 2 pumps of product to palms of dry hands.

2. Rub hands together, palm to palm.

3. Rub in between and around fingers.
chunks.section_title: Rub hands together, palm to palm.

chunks.text:
4. Rub back of each hand with palm of other hand.

5. Rub fingertips of each hand in opposite palm.
chunks.section_title: Rub back of each hand with palm of other hand.

chunks.text:
6. Rub each thumb clasped in opposite hand.
- Rub hands for 15 seconds.

7. Rub hands until product is dry. Do not use paper towels.
chunks.section_title: Rub each thumb clasped in opposite hand.

chunks.text:
8. Once dry, your hands are safe.----# How to Handrub1. Apply 1 to 2 pumps of product to palms of dry hands.

2. Rub hands together, palm to palm.
chunks.section_title: Once dry, your hands are safe.----# How to Handrub1. Apply 1 to 2 pumps of product to palms of dry hands.

chunks.text:
3. Rub in between and around fingers.

4. Rub back of each hand with palm of other hand.
chunks.section_title: Rub in between and around fingers.

chunks.text:
5. Rub fingertips of each hand in opposite palm.

6. Rub each thumb clasped in opposite hand.
- Rub hands for 15 seconds.
chunks.section_title: Rub fingertips of each hand in opposite palm.

chunks.text:
7. Rub hands until product is dry. Do not use paper towels.

8. Once dry, your hands are safe.
```
chunks.section_title: Rub hands until product is dry. Do not use paper towels.
